name: The Tourist Trap
detailed_description:
The Tourist Trap is a Escape Room game focused on cultural aspects from around the world!

Your goal is to be the first to escape the facility!

You have awoken in a strange place...
It seems like this place had a strange goal...
They are training clones to be the perfect Tourist! Something went wrong and the clones have become sentient.
Now you are racing against the clock versus 4 other clones to escape this facility by completing all culture based puzzle rooms!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • Processor: Dual core from Intel or AMD at 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600/9600GT, ATI/AMD Radeon HD2600/3600
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 5 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible
